## sleep() function

Suspend VU execution for the specified duration.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export function sleep(t: number): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  t | <code>number</code> | Duration, in seconds. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
